dragon begins to glow dark black as well as the vines.

>With a surprised yelp, Neody jumps to the side, avoiding the optic
>shot. He swears and fires two organic pods at the dragon, hoping the
>other destrons would help him out. If the pods hit, they would release
>vines to wrap around and capture the dragon.
